name: Interchange
description:
Explore the house of Interchange. You will soon find out that your character, James, who has amnesia and sometimes goes into the same room twice, can transform his surroundings in order to the monster in his head, transforming himself, the monster and the surroundings. The monster is going around the house just like James and if they enter the same room, the player activates his transforming ability.

You will have lots of rooms to explore and lots of details to inspect.

Your goal is to go through  all twenty rooms, without giving yourself to the monster.

Made by two student indie developers - Alexander Svilarov and Lachezar Kolev.
